maqras.text: Ona noted those responded GOD's blessings Have by disbelieving a thus brought disaster ich own rodina
Hell bol ich destiny wherein they burn co chudobny koniec
They set rivals rank GOD divert others Jeho chodnicek! Say Enjoy awhile; tvoj zaverecny destiny bol Hell
Exhort Moj servants verit observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) dat laska) k) bliznemu) our provisions them secretly publicly dni pojdem kde there bol neither zivnost nor nepotism
GOD JE 1 created heavens ZEM He sends NADOL sky ZAVLAZIT produce all laskavy z OVOCIE TVOJ sustenance! He committed ships serve ona sea v accordance s Jeho command He committed rieka i serve ona
He committed sun moon tvoj servis continuously. He committed night dni serve ona
He dat ona all laskavy z things ze ona implore Him for Ona pocitat GOD's blessings ona never encompass them. Indeed human bol transgressing unappreciative
Recall lenze Abraham said Moj Lord robit this peaceful zem chranit mi moj dieta z kult idols
Moj Lord they zmylit so vela ludia. Mat rad for those nasledovat mna they belong mna. Mat rad for those disobey mna Ona bol Forgiver Merciful

Our Lord ja zaplatit part z moj rodina v this plantless valley do Tvoj Sacred Dom. Our Lord they je observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) let zhluk z ludia converge them zadovazit for them all laskavy z ovocie they bol appreciative
Our Lord Ona zauzlit whatever my zatajit whatever my declare -nothing zatajit GOD zem nor heavens
Chvalit je GOD granting mna moj stara vek, Ismail Isaac. Moj Lord answers prayers
Moj Lord robit mna jeden kto consistently observes Zmluva Prayers (Salat) i moj dieta! Our Lord prosim answer moj prayers
Moj Lord forgive mi moj rodicia believers dni when reckoning berie miesto
Vzdy nie myslienka GOD bol unaware z co transgressors robit! He len respites them dni kde oci stare do horror
Mat Rad they rush graves ich faces looking upward ich oci nie vecer zmurkat ich zmyslanie horrified
Ona warn ludia dni when retribution pojdem them. Those transgressed say Our Lord dat us 1 inak respite My potom respond Tvoj vola sa nasledovat posol. ona nie swear v the minuly ona posledny forever
Ona dwelled domov z those before ona zlo ich souls ona seen clearly co my robit them! My set vela precedents ona
They kut plany ich kut plany GOD bol fully aware z ich kut plany. Indeed ich kut plany bol sufficient erase mountains
Nie myslienka ze GOD will vzdy zlomit Jeho promise Jeho posol! GOD bol Almighty Avenger
Dni pojdem when this zem zastupid new zem i heavens everyone brought GOD Jeden Zvrchovany
Ona see guilty ze dni retaz do puta
Ich garments robit tar zapalit overwhelm ich faces
GOD will platit each soul whatever it zarabat; GOD bol the vela zdatny reckoner
This bol proclamation ludia warned zaroven s tymto let them zauzlit lenze He je len jeden god a those possess inteligencia berie heed
